summary: "Please, it's all I've ever wanted: to be Queen."—Sansa Stark, S1E1 I believe in the end it will all come down to Sansa and Arya...
caption:
“Please, it’s all I’ve ever wanted: to be Queen."—Sansa Stark, S1E1

I believe in the end it will all come down to Sansa and Arya Stark and the Iron Throne. Why? So, so many reasons (much of my theory, plus Sansa has by far the best character dev of the series). 

But I also believe it will come down to the sisters because Ned Stark told Arya so. 

“Let me tell you something about wolves, child. When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives,” Ned told Arya all the way in that first book, before he was gone, before the real Game began. Everyone remembers that part. But do they remember the rest?

“Summer is the time for squabbles. In winter, we must protect one another, keep each other warm, share our strengths. So if you must hate, Arya, hate those who would truly do us harm…Sansa is your sister. You may be as different as the sun and the moon, but the same blood flows through both your hearts. You need her, as she needs you.”

Everyone’s always focused on what’s blazing. A song of ice and fire: Dany and Jon, right? But Jon and Dany are there to defeat the winter. The prophecies say nothing about who will be king or queen in the summer that follows the Battle. And after the battle, the fire and ice will melt, or sputter out…but the sun and moon will remain, in every season.

I believe Sansa will rule. I hope that Arya is by her side, although I worry more about our murder queen. On the day of this premiere, I will stand and tell you that it will be, or should be, about Sansa and Arya in the end. Two sides of a coin. The sun and moon. The Stark sisters, who learned to respect what the other had, who learned to need each other. 

(The pack survives.)

summary: Game Of Thrones returns TONIGHT! ❗️ Housekeeping rules: I will post scenes from the newest episode on TUESDAY. This will happen...
body:
Game Of Thrones returns TONIGHT! ❗️ Housekeeping rules: I will post scenes from the newest episode on TUESDAY. This will happen every week until the end of the season. If you get spoiled by what I post, you can not say I did not warn you. It is YOUR fault if you browse social media without watching. I will be posting a NON-SPOILER PHOTO immediately after the new episode so you can discuss what you saw with others. ❗️

Here are the times for every episode:

**USA/Canada**: HBO at 9pm EST (Sunday)

**UK**: Sky Atlantic at 2am (Monday)

**France**: OCS Tv at 3am (Monday)

**Australia**: Foxtel at 11am (Monday)

**Belgium**: BeTV at 3am (Monday)

**Germany**: Sky Atlantic at 3am (Monday) **Spain**:Canal+ / Antena3 at 3am (Monday)

**Italy**: Sky Atlantic at 3am (Monday)

**Norway**: HBO Nordic at 3am (Monday)

**India**: Hotstar at 6:30am (Monday)

**Brasil**: HBO Brasil at 10pm (Sunday)

**Indonesia**: HBO at 9am (Monday)

**Mexico**: HBO at 8pm (Sunday)

**South Africa**: M-Net at 3am (Monday)

**Russia**: Fox at 7pm (Monday)

**Central America**: HBO Cinemax at 7pm (Sunday) **Ghana**: M-Net at 1am (Monday)

**Israel**: Yes Oh / Hot HBO at 4am (Monday)

**China**: Tencent at 9am (Monday)

**Netherlands**: RTL 4 / Ziggo Movies & Series at 3am (Monday)

**Turkey**: CNBC-e / E2 at 4am (Monday)

**Nigeria**: M-Net 101 on DsTv at 2am (Monday)

summary: 15 X-Men Who Match Up With Your Favorite Game of Thrones Characters
title: 15 X-Men Who Match Up With Your Favorite Game of Thrones Characters
body:
15 X-Men Who Match Up With Your Favorite Game of Thrones Characters

With the final season of Game of Thrones upon us, we thought it necessary to take a closer look at the franchise, and heck, why not compare them to another that is also looking down a barrel; the X-Men. The characters in both franchises share a surprising amount of similarities, but that’s not so crazy. They are both built on solid concepts and storylines that span years of carefully crafted…

View On WordPress

summary: Things I want from Seaon 8 of GOT
body:
Things I want from Seaon 8 of GOT

Just wanted to make a list of all the things I want to happen/not happen. (Yes I recognize some of these are way more likely to happen then others)

  • Jaime and Bran talk - Jaime apologizes, Bran says something creepy about being the Three eyed raven
  • Only one (1) episodes worth of petty bickering in Winterfell (I know there’s alot of drama to be had but I havent waited more than a year to see my favs fight amongst themselves)
  • Arya and Sansa stand together (I feel like the last season would be completely pointless if Arya. And Sansa just start being bratty and fighting each other again)
  • Dany and Sansa become friends or at least recoganize their not the true enemy. (They have so much in common i want them to see that!)
  • All the characters reuniting!! (Arya&Gendry, Tyrion&Sansa, Jon&Sam, Jorah&Sam, Jaime&Brienne)
  • Tormund being so not okay with Jaime there!
  • A final conversation between Sansa and Cersei (their relationship is so interesting)
  • Cersei finally getting her comuppence!!
  • Sansa and Pod!! (Give me sansa smiling when he comes back to Winterfell, Bronn making an inappropriate joke, Pod being all cute and bashful- they don’t even have to end up together I just want something my shipping heart can hold onto!!)

  • Tormund being so not okay with Jaime there!
  • A final conversation between Sansa and Cersei (their relationship is so interesting)
  • Cersei finally getting her comuppence!!
  • Sansa and Pod!! (Give me sansa smiling when he comes back to Winterfell, Bronn making an inappropriate joke, Pod being all cute and bashful- they don’t even have to end up together I just want something my shipping heart can hold onto!!)
trail.content:
Things I want from Seaon 8 of GOT

Just wanted to make a list of all the things I want to happen/not happen. (Yes I recognize some of these are way more likely to happen then others)

  • Jaime and Bran talk - Jaime apologizes, Bran says something creepy about being the Three eyed raven
  • Only one (1) episodes worth of petty bickering in Winterfell (I know there’s alot of drama to be had but I havent waited more than a year to see my favs fight amongst themselves)
  • Arya and Sansa stand together (I feel like the last season would be completely pointless if Arya. And Sansa just start being bratty and fighting each other again)
  • Dany and Sansa become friends or at least recoganize their not the true enemy. (They have so much in common i want them to see that!)
  • All the characters reuniting!! (Arya&Gendry, Tyrion&Sansa, Jon&Sam, Jorah&Sam, Jaime&Brienne)
  • Tormund being so not okay with Jaime there!
  • A final conversation between Sansa and Cersei (their relationship is so interesting)
  • Cersei finally getting her comuppence!!
  • Sansa and Pod!! (Give me sansa smiling when he comes back to Winterfell, Bronn making an inappropriate joke, Pod being all cute and bashful- they don’t even have to end up together I just want something my shipping heart can hold onto!!)
